price: Kandi mu by’ukuri ndatinya ko bene wacu (bazareka inzira yawe) nyuma yanjye, kandi umugore wanjye ari urubereri. Bityo, mpa umuzungura uguturutseho.
arabic: وَإِنِّي خِفۡتُ ٱلۡمَوَٰلِيَ مِن وَرَآءِي وَكَانَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتِي عَاقِرٗا فَهَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī khif'tu al-mawāliya min warāī wakānati im'ra-atī ʿāqiran fahab lī min ladunka waliyyan
